messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main reason for Call of Cthulhu's beloved status?
It is mostly due to the power of Lovecraft's world, and Chaosium's dedication in bringing it forth.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What has Chaosium done with its team of experienced game professionals?
They have managed a successful combination of roleplaying adventure with Lovecraftian horror in this 7th edition.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the author of the Lovecraftian horror edition?
Sandy Petersen
